items.name: var vm_flags: UInt32
items.desc: Option flags. Should be set to 0 on read.

items.name: var vm_pkt_iovcnt: UInt32
items.desc: The number of packet buffers in vm_pkt_iov.

items.name: var vm_pkt_size: Int
items.desc: The size of the packet, in bytes.

items.name: init(vm_pkt_size: Int, vm_pkt_iov: UnsafeMutablePointer<iovec>, vm_pkt_iovcnt: UInt32, vm_flags: UInt32)
